Name: Wallpaper Master
About the game: Wallpaper Master is a wallpaper software. Unlike other wallpaper software, Wallpaper Master adopts a brand new technology, a new wallpaper will be randomly synthesized after each refresh. Wallpaper Master system resource overhead is extremely low, most of the time CPU utilization is 0%，Prolonged use will not affect computer performance。 Features Random Stop Motion Animation Wallpaper A new wallpaper is randomly synthesized after each refresh to keep the desktop fresh. Very low system resource overhead Support Live Wallpaper Support for live wallpapers in multiple formats such as web pages and videos Convert live wallpaper to stop motion animation Convert live wallpapers into stop-motion animated wallpapers with more resource saving AI Wallpaper Set artificial intelligence as wallpaper, you can observe the process of artificial intelligence playing games on the desktop, and it will get better and better results with the passage of training time. Come and train your unique AI.
